title: Bigg Boss 10: Mona Lisa and Vikrant being paid a huge amount of money for getting married on Salman Khan’s show?
text:
Tanishaa Mukherji, Armaan Kohli and VJ Andy spotted together in Goa! 
Marriage is always a surefire formula to regale the Indian masses. And the makers of Bigg Boss 10 know this better as they have decided to host the wedding ceremony of Mona Lisa and her boyfriend Vikrant Singh Rajpoot inside the Bigg Boss house. And though a lot of viewers have slammed Mona and Vikrant on social media, for making their marriage a cheap publicity stunt for mere TRPs, Vikrant, before entering the house made it clear that their marriage is not for the huge numbers on the TRP chart. 
Well, don’t know about publicity, but money might be playing a vital role here. After all, last time when there was a marriage that took place inside the Bigg Boss house, the couple was reportedly offered a huge amount of money for tying the knot on the show. Sara Ali Khan, who was one of the contestants in Bigg Boss 4 married boyfriend Ali Merchant inside the house and buzz was that the makers paid them Rs 50 lakh. So there is a high possibility that Mona and Vikrant might also be getting paid a huge sum for having their shaadi on the high voltage reality show. ALSO READ: Will Mona Lisa and Vikrant Singh Rajpoot’s wedding inside the Bigg Boss 10 house jinx their relationship? 
Vikrant stepped inside the Bigg Boss house with a wedding ring in his hand and wearing heart on his sleeves to propose his significant other for marriage. While Vikrant waited in the activity area against a brightly lit romantic backdrop, Bigg Boss asked Mona to go inside without revealing much. As Mona stepped inside, she was taken aback to find Vikrant standing there. When she asked him the reason of his visit, he went down on his knees, took out the ring and proposed her for marriage. Mona said yes and the couple will get married inside the house in a couple of hours. Mona’s mother, Vikrant’s sister, their close brief and ex- Bigg Boss contestant Nirahua along with his girlfriend Amrapali will be a part of the ceremony.
